import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{companies}from'../data/companies';export const useCompanies=()=>{const[companiesList,setCompaniesList]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const loadCompanies=async()=>{try{setLoading(true);// Имитация загрузки с API
await new Promise(resolve=>setTimeout(resolve,300));setCompaniesList(companies);setError(null);}catch(err){setError('Ошибка загрузки компаний');console.error('Error loading companies:',err);}finally{setLoading(false);}};loadCompanies();},[]);return{companies:companiesList,loading,error};};
